EVERDELL: And the jurors, with the Court's permission, can do the same. THE COURT: Yes. Thank you. Q. Ms. Chapell, I'll just wait a moment. Before you came to testify today, you had some phone calls with the government; is that right? A. Yes. Q. And that was to prepare your testimony today; correct? A. Yes. Q. And before you spoke to them, they sent you those three invoices that we were just talking about, is that right? A. Yes. Q. And you looked at them to verify that they were true and accurate records that FedEx had in their system, right? A. Yes. Q. And those were the only invoices they sent you to verify; is that right? A.
